title: Lakshmi Devi Stud Earrings - A Timeless Temple Jewellery Treasure
materials: Ruby and Emerald Accents. Traditional Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting sheen.
features: Intricately handcrafted Lakshmi Devi motif at the center, embodying prosperity and auspiciousness. Surrounded by a delicate filigree design embellished with sparkling CZ diamonds mimicking traditional Kundan work. Accented with vibrant Ruby and Emerald stones for a pop of color. The design draws inspiration from ancient temple art (గుడి నగిషీ).
colors: Red (Rubies) and Green (Emeralds). A classic South Indian color palette symbolizing wealth
occasions: and traditional ceremonies such as Seemantham and Half-Saree functions. Also suitable for adding a touch of cultural elegance to contemporary outfits.
description: A blend of traditional South Indian artistry and modern craftsmanship. The Lakshmi Devi motif adds a spiritual significance to the piece, making it an ideal heirloom. The high-quality CZ diamonds provide a brilliant sparkle at a fraction of the cost. The earrings are lightweight and comfortable to wear all day long. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a long-lasting, radiant finish.
